默认情况下，每个子项会自动均等分所在分隔面板容器。.en-us: By default, each child item will be evenly divided in the container of the split panel.

设置参数`layout='vertical'`启用垂直布局。.en-us: Enable vertical layout by setting the `layout='vertical'` parameter.

为子项设置默认尺寸。.en-us: Set the default size of the child item.

为子项设置允许调整的尺寸范围，支持数值像素或百分比格式。.en-us: Set the range of the size adjustment of the child item, which supports numeric pixel or percentage format.

控制子项区域开启快捷折叠功能。.en-us: Enable the collapsible feature of the child item region.

设置`lazy=True`启用延迟渲染模式，即在每次拖拽调整结束后才会更新布局。.en-us: Enable the deferred rendering mode by setting `lazy=True`, that is, the layout will be updated only after the drag adjustment ends.
